document.full_text: most russians overestimate how healthy they are and many run high health risks by smoking, abusing alcohol, being obese and failing to take enough exercise, according to a report published on tuesday.
document.title: unhealthy russians think they're in good shape
lines_and_colors: most russians overestimate how healthy they are and many run high health risks by smoking, abusing alcohol, being obese and failing to take enough exercise, according to a report published on tuesday.
